page.title: 13SPORT IN GOODWORTH CLATFORD.
page.content: {SPORTS FACILITIES }are limited within the Goodworth Clatford,Wherwell area.Most people go to the Andover Sports Centre to participate in other sports that aren't in this area.We have got a snooker table,a tennis court,a netball court and a football pitch in our area.The most popular sports are {SWIMMING }and football.Most people in our school prefer sports out of school.There is a {RECREATION }ground in Wherwell.One girl in our school belongs to the Hampshire Gymnastic Squad she was picked to compete against other counties and {HAMPSHIRE }won.There is a pheasant farm in Harewood Forest which rears young pheasants for the popular sport of pheasant shooting.
